question: Which of the following termed the renaming of the Planning Commission as aniti aur durniti?
explanation: Communist Party of India (Marxist) leader Sitaram Yechury termed the renaming of the Planning Commission of India as aniti aur durniti (no policy and bad policy). Mr. Yechury said, “just a change of nomenclature and gimmickry does not serve any purpose. Let us see what the government plans to do with it”.
